channel.title: How to connect client and server?
channel.description:
Now , i got all my server done and stuff. But how do i connect my client and server ? I mean if i upload my client to the internet , a person downloads it , then when he runs the client and logs in he is in my server ?
That problem now solved. But now , i take no - ip duc , choose tools , and there open port check tools.
I do the test , and it says : Error: I could not see your service on xxx.xxx.xx.xx on port (43594) Reason: Connection refused
That was when the server source server wasnt running , when its running then : Error: I could not see your service on xxx.xxx.xx.xx on port (43594) Reason: Connection timed out

item.title: How to connect client and server?
item.dc:creator: @flashsnakz flashsnakz
item.description:
@flashsnakz wrote:

Now , i got all my server done and stuff. But how do i connect my client and server ? I mean if i upload my client to the internet , a person downloads it , then when he runs the client and logs in he is in my server ?

That problem now solved. But now , i take no - ip duc , choose tools , and there open port check tools.

I do the test , and it says :
Error: I could not see your service on xxx.xxx.xx.xx on port (43594)
Reason: Connection refused

That was when the server source server wasnt running , when its running then :
Error: I could not see your service on xxx.xxx.xx.xx on port (43594)
Reason: Connection timed out
